name: Guristas 'Dirty' Explosive System
description: A rudimentary, though effective, explosion matrix, used specifically for Guristas special operation tactical strikes. Once inside a ship's cargo bay, this “dirty” bomb will, upon detonation, cause massive damage to any ship, structure, or starship base. It's volatility, however, is also a liability: Getting the bomb to its destination is more dangerous than actually utilizing the explosion system.
